attributes.action: Use the money proposed to build a D Day memorial to build a nhs unit
attributes.background: We all know that the NHS is on its knees , need I say more?!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you mean by an "NHS unit". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to spend the money it has promised to give to the D-day Memorial to the NHS instead.
